generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and tram tracks, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and pedestrian areas.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including commercial and residential structures.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the sidewalks and in front of some buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible walking on the sidewalks.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a silver car directly ahead.
- truck: A dark-colored truck is visible on the left side of the road.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible above the road, controlling traffic flow.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible on poles along the road, including a yield sign.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- fence: A fence is visible on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
